actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage, or 7 (1d8 +3) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh.
actions.name: Club

actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage plus 5 (2d4) poison damage.
actions.name: Shortbow

special_abilities.desc: The woodwose has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can’t put the woodwose to sleep.
special_abilities.name: Fey Touched

special_abilities.desc: The woodwose can communicate with beasts and plants as if they shared a language.
special_abilities.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants

special_abilities.desc:
The woodwose’s innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12). The woodwose can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: shillelagh
3/day: pass without trace
1/day: entangle
special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
